# Welcome, 
I'm Théodore Cherrière, a Postdoctoral researcher at [RICAM](https://www.oeaw.ac.at/ricam/home).

I hold a Ph.D. in **electrical engineering** from the [Paris-Saclay University](https://www.universite-paris-saclay.fr/en) ([ENS Paris-Saclay](https://ens-paris-saclay.fr/en)), where I worked at the [SATIE](https://satie.ens-paris-saclay.fr/fr). My PhD thesis can be found [here](https://theses.fr/2023UPAST159) (in French).
My main research interest consists of topology optimization of electrical machines.
